String.string: The {@Rgn:46017$$Shadowspark Chamber} is in the {@Rgn:46012$$Raga Kabash Spire}.
Kill the {@LinkCreature:46#401#argonomorph ossugon warlords} near the {@Rgn:46017$$Shadowspark Chamber}.
Kill the {@LinkCreature:46#403#argonomorph iskaragards} located in the {@Rgn:46007$$Raga Evala Depths}.
Destroy the {@LinkCreature:246#3011#symbral amplifiers} to hurt the argon power grid.
